content: crocheted moebius scarf skill level beginner/easy size approx 4 wide x 33 circumference materials dk or worsted weight soft fuzzy novelty yarn sample shown in online linie punta size j/10 6 mm crochet hook or size that works well with your chosen yarn -- gauge not too important in this design tapestry needle terms/abbreviations beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet hook hk repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch stitch st pattern notes scarf is worked in a long strip first then given a half-twist before joining into a circle by seaming foundation row to last row with slip_stitch through both thicknesses scarf foundation row chain 15 single_crochet in second chain from hk and in ea chain across turn 14 single_crochet row 1 chain 3 double_crochet in ea single_crochet across turn 14 double_crochet 1 row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet across turn 14 single_crochet repeat last 2 row until piece measures approx 33 or until yarn is almost gone finishing before seaming give one end of the scarf a half-twist then hold foundation row together with last row worked slip st through both thicknesses in each stitch across to form scarf into a circle weave in all ends copyright 2017 2003 kathy north -- www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not reproduce pattern for commercial purposes 2
